0502.name: Transport::ConnectionFailure
0502.message:
An error has occurred. 
Please try again later. 

If the problem persists, please 
make a note of this error code and 
visit support.nintendo.com.
0502.short_description: Could not connect to the game servers.
0502.long_description: There was a problem connecting to the game servers. This is most likely due to the servers being unstable or overloaded.
0502.short_solution: The game servers are most likely unstable or overloaded. If this issue persists, please check the server status for maintenance, or try again later.
0502.long_solution: You can simply try again, but if this issue persists, please check the server status at https://status.pretendo.zip/ and check for any maintenance.
